channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Directorist – Business Directory Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-24981|2024-08-03T19:49:14.417Z -- unknown -- directorist%20%E2%80%93%20business%20directory%20plugin
item.description: The Directorist WordPress plugin before 7.0.6.2 was vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery to Remote File Upload leading to arbitrary PHP shell uploads in the wp-content/plugins directory.
